channel.title: 新MBP/Mac预热？macOS Catalina 10.15.1 beta 开始支持Navi RX5700/XT
channel.description: 新MBP/Mac预热？macOS Catalina 10.15.1 beta 开始支持Navi RX5700/XT

item.title: 新MBP/Mac预热？macOS Catalina 10.15.1 beta 开始支持Navi RX5700/XT[0-50]
item.description:
新MBP/Mac预热？macOS Catalina 10.15.1 beta 开始支持Navi RX5700/XT Update: According to Apple's release notes, ‌macOS Catalina‌ 10.15.1 introduces support for the AMD Navi RDNA eGPU architecture and brings some changes to ‌Photos‌. You can now filter by Favorites, Edited, ‌Photos‌, Videos, or Keywords in the All ‌Photos‌ view, and you can choose View > Metadata > Titles to enable titles and filenames in the All ‌Photos‌ View.
1. New Features in 10.15.1 Beta #1eGPU – Support has been added for the AMD Navi RDNA architecture. For more information see Use an external graphics processor with your Mac.
Photos – You can now filter by Favorites, Edited, Photos, Videos or Keywords in the new All Photos view. (45589765)
Photos – You can now choose View > Metadata > Titles to enable titles and filenames in the new All Photos view. (48363059)
item.content:encoded:
Radeon:
新MBP/Mac预热？macOS Catalina 10.15.1 beta 开始支持Navi RX5700/XT
Update: According to Apple's release notes, ‌macOS Catalina‌ 10.15.1 introduces support for the AMD Navi RDNA eGPU architecture and brings some changes to ‌Photos‌. You can now filter by Favorites, Edited, ‌Photos‌, Videos, or Keywords in the All ‌Photos‌ view, and you can choose View > Metadata > Titles to enable titles and filenames in the All ‌Photos‌ View.
1. New Features in 10.15.1 Beta #1eGPU – Support has been added for the AMD Navi RDNA architecture. For more information see Use an external graphics processor with your Mac.
Photos – You can now filter by Favorites, Edited, Photos, Videos or Keywords in the new All Photos view. (45589765)
Photos – You can now choose View > Metadata > Titles to enable titles and filenames in the new All Photos view. (48363059)

Radeon:
感觉月底发布会也该要来了

令和猛男:
电脑爆特了，想买

rhocas:
5700不得热炸？
苹果为啥一直拒绝黄老板啊

moekyo:
我也想搞一台自己的mac了，发布会来吧

vampire219:
最大的亮点就是老mac也能用5700做显卡坞了吧

wzk3232:
rhocas 发表于 2019-10-16 23:17
5700不得热炸？
苹果为啥一直拒绝黄老板啊
不给改驱动吧

rhocas 发表于 2019-10-16 23:17
5700不得热炸？ 苹果为啥一直拒绝黄老板啊
被坑过呗

红都剧院24排4号:
窄边框的14寸mbp估计得等到明年，心累

黄耀明:
就想知道 窄边框iMac 啥时候出
出了我买一台放家里看！

13寸窄边框有吗
